title: Creative Application of Design Software for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced skill acquisition for immediate workplace application, with hybrid online-offline session operations for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can replicate basic components of 3D forms with 85% accuracy using fundamental operations of vector tools.
Learners creatively reconstruct complex design elements to produce prototypes applicable to work projects, completing at least three iterations.
Learners master methods to geometrically represent abstract concepts using design software and apply at least two optimization techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
